title: Aiseesoft HEIC Converter 1.0.20 – Convert photos from HEIC to JPG or PNG
content: HEIC is the image format since Apple’s new iOS 13. This photo format saves much space without compressing image quality. It is considered as the replacement of JPEG image format. However, HEIC has some disadvantages. HEIC photos cannot be opened and viewed on outdated versions of the iOS or many other platforms. But image format […]

title: iPack 2.3.5 – Full-featured compressed-archive manager
content: iPack is a full-featured compressed archives manager.   Features Compress 7z, zip, jar, and rar archives Decompress 7z, zip, jar, rar, cab, iso, arj, gz and bz2 archives NEW! title: Reaktor 6.3.2 – Powerful sound design/music production tool

title: ArtRage 6.1.1 – Simple, intuitive painting app

title: A New Beginning – Final Cut 2.0.4 – A cinematic adventure-thriller game
content: A New Beginning – Final Cut is a cinematic adventure-thriller done graphic novel-style. In this charming and witty adventure, earth is on the brink of impending climate cataclysm. title: Lonely Mountains: Downhill 1.0 – Action Mountain Biking Game

title: iCab 5.9.2 – Alternative Web browser
